#include<stdio.h>
#define ll long long int
#define MAX 10000008
#define md 10007

ll a[10000011],n_prime[10000011];

ll mod(ll a,ll b,ll ans)
{
    if(a==0 || a==1)
    return a;
    if(b==0)
    return 1;
    if(b==1)
    return (a*ans)%md;
    if(b%2==0)
    return mod((a*a)%md,b>>1,ans);
    else
    return mod(a,b-1,(a*ans)%md);
}

void g_prime()
{
    ll i;
    for(i=3;i<10000;i+=2)
    {
        if(a[i]==0)
        {
            ll j,inc=2*i;
            for(j=i*i;j<MAX;j+=inc)
            a[j]=1;
        }
    }
    n_prime[1]=0;
    n_prime[2]=1;
    for(i=3;i<MAX;i++)
    {
        if(a[i]==0 && (i&1))
        n_prime[i]=n_prime[i-1]+1;
        else
        n_prime[i]=n_prime[i-1];
    }
}

int main()
{
    ll n;
    g_prime();
    while(scanf("%lld",&n)!=EOF)
    {
        if(n==0 || n==1)
        printf("0\n");
        else if(n==2)
        printf("1\n");
        else
        printf("%lld\n",mod(2,n_prime[n]-1,1));
    }
    return 0;
}
